## theta() function

Calculates the angle between the two points.  theta 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function theta(p1: PointXY, p2: PointXY): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p1 | [PointXY](./util.pointxy) | First point |
|  p2 | [PointXY](./util.pointxy) | Second point  {<!-- -->number<!-- -->} The angle between the two points. |
